20110126140151.000|20110126140156.000|TR0|with the U.S. that will see each

20110126140211.000|20110126140216.000|TR0|around the world, around the
20110126140216.000|20110126140221.000|TR0|clock. This is RT.
20110126140221.000|20110126140226.000|TR0|
20110126140226.000|20110126140231.000|TR0|Russia's Prime Minister says the
20110126140231.000|20110126140236.000|TR0|suicide bombing at Domodedovo
20110126140236.000|20110126140241.000|TR0|airport on Monday which killed
20110126140241.000|20110126140246.000|TR0|35 people is not linked to
20110126140246.000|20110126140251.000|TR0|Chechen based terrorists. Here's
20110126140251.000|20110126140256.000|TR0|what Vladimir Putin told
20110126140256.000|20110126140301.000|TR0|reporters.
20110126140301.000|20110126140306.000|TR0|
20110126140306.000|20110126140311.000|TR0|As early results of the
20110126140311.000|20110126140316.000|TR0|investigation suggest, this
20110126140316.000|20110126140321.000|TR0|terror attack has nothing to do
20110126140321.000|20110126140326.000|TR0|with the Chechen republic. And
20110126140326.000|20110126140331.000|TR0|we are not going to have any
20110126140331.000|20110126140336.000|TR0|negotiations with terrorsts. Not
20110126140336.000|20110126140341.000|TR0|a single country in the world
20110126140341.000|20110126140346.000|TR0|that respects itself ever does
20110126140346.000|20110126140351.000|TR0|this. That's common
20110126140351.000|20110126140356.000|TR0|international practice.
20110126140356.000|20110126140401.000|TR0|
20110126140401.000|20110126140406.000|TR0|Well, state flags are at
20110126140406.000|20110126140411.000|TR0|half-mast all across the Moscow
20110126140411.000|20110126140416.000|TR0|region to mourn the victims of
20110126140416.000|20110126140421.000|TR0|the attack at Russia's busiest
20110126140421.000|20110126140426.000|TR0|airport. People have been
20110126140426.000|20110126140431.000|TR0|gathering at the site of the
20110126140431.000|20110126140436.000|TR0|blast to pay tribute to those
20110126140436.000|20110126140441.000|TR0|who died. RT's Irina Galushko is
20110126140441.000|20110126140446.000|TR0|at Domodedovo airport and joins
20110126140446.000|20110126140451.000|TR0|me now.
20110126140451.000|20110126140456.000|TR0|
20110126140456.000|20110126140501.000|TR0|My brother called me and said
20110126140501.000|20110126140506.000|TR0|that he and his wife were trying
20110126140506.000|20110126140511.000|TR0|to get out, that they were
20110126140511.000|20110126140516.000|TR0|bleeding and didn't understand
20110126140516.000|20110126140521.000|TR0|what was going on. There was an
20110126140521.000|20110126140526.000|TR0|explosion... Then we got
20110126140526.000|20110126140531.000|TR0|disconnected. I couldn't believe
20110126140531.000|20110126140536.000|TR0|that this happened to my brother
20110126140536.000|20110126140541.000|TR0|and his wife, because we think
20110126140541.000|20110126140546.000|TR0|that these things only happen to
20110126140546.000|20110126140551.000|TR0|someone else. I now understand
20110126140551.000|20110126140556.000|TR0|that it really happened, but it
20110126140556.000|20110126140601.000|TR0|is hard to fathom why somebody
20110126140601.000|20110126140606.000|TR0|would do such a thing. Innocent
20110126140606.000|20110126140611.000|TR0|people became victims of the
20110126140611.000|20110126140616.000|TR0|attack.
20110126140616.000|20110126140621.000|TR0|
20110126140621.000|20110126140626.000|TR0|The harrowing scenes from the
20110126140626.000|20110126140631.000|TR0|moment the blast hit. For those
20110126140631.000|20110126140636.000|TR0|who witnessed the attack its a
20110126140636.000|20110126140641.000|TR0|memory that wont fade fast. NEW
20110126140641.000|20110126140646.000|TR0|SB I got to the airport and was
20110126140646.000|20110126140651.000|TR0|waiting for someone when the
20110126140651.000|20110126140656.000|TR0|bomb went off. Then there was an
20110126140656.000|20110126140701.000|TR0|explosion. People came running
20110126140701.000|20110126140706.000|TR0|out of the terminal building
20110126140706.000|20110126140711.000|TR0|quite clearly distressed with
20110126140711.000|20110126140716.000|TR0|blood and obviously injured. The
20110126140716.000|20110126140721.000|TR0|blast hit at peak time as around
20110126140721.000|20110126140726.000|TR0|30 flights were due to land. The
20110126140726.000|20110126140731.000|TR0|bomb it seems timed to cause
20110126140731.000|20110126140736.000|TR0|maximum devastation. I just felt
20110126140736.000|20110126140741.000|TR0|kind of numb and then I woke up
20110126140741.000|20110126140746.000|TR0|this morning and it kind of
20110126140746.000|20110126140751.000|TR0|dawned on me that it had
20110126140751.000|20110126140756.000|TR0|happened and that wed really
20110126140756.000|20110126140801.000|TR0|come quite close. There was
20110126140801.000|20110126140806.000|TR0|literally that 2 minute window
20110126140806.000|20110126140811.000|TR0|where if wed been delayed it
20110126140811.000|20110126140816.000|TR0|wouldve been very different.
20110126140816.000|20110126140821.000|TR0|Others didnt have such a lucky
20110126140821.000|20110126140826.000|TR0|escape. My brother couldve been
20110126140826.000|20110126140831.000|TR0|killed. I want whoever did this
20110126140831.000|20110126140836.000|TR0|to be found and to be punished.
20110126140836.000|20110126140841.000|TR0|And punished they will be as
20110126140841.000|20110126140846.000|TR0|President Medveydev has vowed
20110126140846.000|20110126140851.000|TR0|that all those responsible will
20110126140851.000|20110126140856.000|TR0|be held accountable. As
20110126140856.000|20110126140901.000|TR0|Investigators now work to
20110126140901.000|20110126140906.000|TR0|establish exactly who is behind
20110126140906.000|20110126140911.000|TR0|the attack the finger of blame
20110126140911.000|20110126140916.000|TR0|has also fallen on the airport
20110126140916.000|20110126140921.000|TR0|and transport authorities. Yet
20110126140921.000|20110126140926.000|TR0|people have shown a resilience
20110126140926.000|20110126140931.000|TR0|that many feel is a commendable
20110126140931.000|20110126140936.000|TR0|trait of the Russian people The
20110126140936.000|20110126140941.000|TR0|can do get on with it attitude
20110126140941.000|20110126140946.000|TR0|is exactly the sort of attitude
20110126140946.000|20110126140951.000|TR0|you need to adopt in a situation
20110126140951.000|20110126140956.000|TR0|like this. In the aftermath of
20110126140956.000|20110126141001.000|TR0|the attack people have rallied
20110126141001.000|20110126141006.000|TR0|donating blood at hospitals and
20110126141006.000|20110126141011.000|TR0|ensuring the victims and their
20110126141011.000|20110126141016.000|TR0|families receive all the help
20110126141016.000|20110126141026.000|TR0|they need Amidst the tragedy
20110126141026.000|20110126141031.000|TR0|Russia has stood united in its
20110126141031.000|20110126141036.000|TR0|refusal to be intimidated. STAND
20110126141036.000|20110126141041.000|TR0|UP........................ Here
20110126141041.000|20110126141046.000|TR0|people come to lay tribute an
20110126141046.000|20110126141051.000|TR0|act of remembrance and a mark of
20110126141051.000|20110126141056.000|TR0|respect for those who lost their
20110126141056.000|20110126141101.000|TR0|lives in the attack. Sara Firth
20110126141101.000|20110126141106.000|TR0|RT Moscow.
20110126141106.000|20110126141111.000|TR0|
20110126141111.000|20110126141116.000|TR0|Matthew Clements, a terrorism
20110126141116.000|20110126141121.000|TR0|expert with Jane's defense group
20110126141121.000|20110126141126.000|TR0|in London says although

20110126141131.000|20110126141136.000|TR0|was flawed - it's hard to make
20110126141136.000|20110126141141.000|TR0|any transport hub completely

20110126141241.000|20110126141246.000|TR0|later on RT.
20110126141246.000|20110126141251.000|TR0|
20110126141251.000|20110126141256.000|TR0|The nuclear cuts treaty between
20110126141256.000|20110126141301.000|TR0|Russia and the U.S., known as
20110126141301.000|20110126141306.000|TR0|START, has been ratified by
20110126141306.000|20110126141311.000|TR0|Russia's Federation Council.
20110126141311.000|20110126141316.000|TR0|
20110126141316.000|20110126141321.000|TR0|The deal would slash both
20110126141321.000|20110126141326.000|TR0|countries' nuclear arsenals by
20110126141326.000|20110126141331.000|TR0|around a third.
20110126141331.000|20110126141336.000|TR0|
20110126141336.000|20110126141341.000|TR0|Now approved by both houses of
20110126141341.000|20110126141346.000|TR0|Russia's Parliament, the treaty
20110126141346.000|20110126141351.000|TR0|must be signed by President
20110126141351.000|20110126141356.000|TR0|Medvedev. Our correspondent Egor
20110126141356.000|20110126141401.000|TR0|Piskunov has the details.
20110126141401.000|20110126141406.000|TR0|
20110126141406.000|20110126141411.000|TR0|Kingston Reif - a Director at
20110126141411.000|20110126141416.000|TR0|the Center for Arms Control and
20110126141416.000|20110126141421.000|TR0|Non-Proliferation - says there's
20110126141421.000|20110126141426.000|TR0|no doubt the START treaty will
20110126141426.000|20110126141431.000|TR0|last its entire ten-year term..
20110126141431.000|20110126141436.000|TR0|
20110126141436.000|20110126141441.000|TR0|You can also share YOUR opinions
20110126141441.000|20110126141446.000|TR0|about the new START treaty
20110126141446.000|20110126141451.000|TR0|through our online poll at RT
20110126141451.000|20110126141456.000|TR0|dot COM. Here's how the voting's
20110126141456.000|20110126141501.000|TR0|going so far.
20110126141501.000|20110126141506.000|TR0|
20110126141506.000|20110126141511.000|TR0|Almost half of you - 44 percent
20110126141511.000|20110126141516.000|TR0|-  think that the new START is
20110126141516.000|20110126141521.000|TR0|just a PR stunt and having a few
20110126141521.000|20110126141526.000|TR0|less nukes doesnt really make
20110126141526.000|20110126141531.000|TR0|much difference. A quarter of
20110126141531.000|20110126141536.000|TR0|you believe that the treaty is
20110126141536.000|20110126141541.000|TR0|sensible and makes the world
20110126141541.000|20110126141546.000|TR0|safer. 22 percent described the
20110126141546.000|20110126141551.000|TR0|treaty as an act of stupidity,
20110126141551.000|20110126141556.000|TR0|saying that Russia and the U.S.
20110126141556.000|20110126141601.000|TR0|will lose out to China and
20110126141601.000|20110126141606.000|TR0|India. And 9 percent of you
20110126141606.000|20110126141611.000|TR0|think that the new treaty is a
20110126141611.000|20110126141616.000|TR0|purely pragmatic move by Russia
20110126141616.000|20110126141621.000|TR0|and the U.S. to save money.
20110126141621.000|20110126141626.000|TR0|Well, those are the results at
20110126141626.000|20110126141631.000|TR0|the moment, but you can still
20110126141631.000|20110126141636.000|TR0|have your say on the issue at RT
20110126141636.000|20110126141641.000|TR0|dot COM.

20110126141921.000|20110126141926.000|TR0|banning protests.
20110126141926.000|20110126141931.000|TR0|
20110126141931.000|20110126141936.000|TR0|Police used tear gas and beat
20110126141936.000|20110126141941.000|TR0|demonstrators in an effort to
20110126141941.000|20110126141946.000|TR0|disperse yesterday's
20110126141946.000|20110126141951.000|TR0|unprecedented rallies against

20110126142006.000|20110126142011.000|TR0|backdrop of growing anger over

20110126142016.000|20110126142021.000|TR0|
20110126142021.000|20110126142026.000|TR0|Nearly half of Egyptians live
20110126142026.000|20110126142031.000|TR0|below the international poverty
20110126142031.000|20110126142036.000|TR0|line, earning less than two U.S.
20110126142036.000|20110126142041.000|TR0|dollars a day.
20110126142041.000|20110126142046.000|TR0|
20110126142046.000|20110126142051.000|TR0|In the annual State of the Union
20110126142051.000|20110126142056.000|TR0|address, Barack Obama looked to
20110126142056.000|20110126142106.000|TR0|heal some of the divisions
20110126142106.000|20110126142111.000|TR0|between Democrats and
20110126142111.000|20110126142116.000|TR0|Republicans in the the Congress.
20110126142116.000|20110126142121.000|TR0|The President called for a
20110126142121.000|20110126142126.000|TR0|massive spending freeze to help
20110126142126.000|20110126142131.000|TR0|revive the country's struggling
20110126142131.000|20110126142136.000|TR0|economy. He also emphasised
20110126142136.000|20110126142141.000|TR0|innovation and investment in
20110126142141.000|20110126142146.000|TR0|infrastructure as key to a
20110126142146.000|20110126142151.000|TR0|successful future. The speech is
20110126142151.000|20110126142156.000|TR0|seen as a move to the centre by
20110126142156.000|20110126142201.000|TR0|Obama, following midterm
20110126142201.000|20110126142206.000|TR0|election losses last year.
20110126142206.000|20110126142211.000|TR0|
20110126142211.000|20110126142216.000|TR0|The new Hezbollah-backed Prime
20110126142216.000|20110126142221.000|TR0|Minister of Lebanon has begun to
20110126142221.000|20110126142226.000|TR0|form his cabinet following two
20110126142226.000|20110126142231.000|TR0|days of widespread protests.
20110126142231.000|20110126142236.000|TR0|Thousands of Sunni Muslims
20110126142236.000|20110126142241.000|TR0|poured onto the streets, burning
20110126142241.000|20110126142246.000|TR0|tyres, throwing rocks and
20110126142246.000|20110126142251.000|TR0|accusing the militant group of a
20110126142251.000|20110126142256.000|TR0|coup. The new PM has vowed to
20110126142256.000|20110126142301.000|TR0|unify Lebanon's diverse society.
20110126142301.000|20110126142306.000|TR0|Hezbollah and its allies ousted
20110126142306.000|20110126142311.000|TR0|the  previous Western-backed
20110126142311.000|20110126142316.000|TR0|government two weeks ago when
20110126142316.000|20110126142321.000|TR0|they quit the cabinet.
20110126142321.000|20110126142326.000|TR0|

20110126142406.000|20110126142411.000|TR0|a few hours.
20110126142411.000|20110126142416.000|TR0|
